desc: Seventh Knight AppMoat is the answer to Zero-Day and Ransomware threats. Our patented technology and 24/7/365 Security Operations Center confirm new files running on your machines are authentic, allowing users to run the software they need while preventing malicious items from compromising your network.

layout.text: Stop Ransomware. Safeguard Your Enterprise From Zero-Day Threats

AppMoat360 is patented endpoint code isolation technology, backed by a 24/7/365 Security Operations Center, that automatically isolates both new and unknown threats on current generation as well as legacy Windows endpoints and servers, while a human engineer vets code integrity for the customer. The combination of AppMoat360 with a primary endpoint protection product provides true defense in depth. The addition of optional MaaS360 integration to AppMoat expands the protection and management capabilities to every OS and mobile device within an organization.
